title: Python Developer
description: Looking for a Python developer experienced with Django, REST APIs, SQL, and Git.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Seeking a frontend engineer skilled in React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Redux, and Git.

title: Machine Learning Intern
description: Hands-on experience with Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Jupyter, and basic ML algorithms required.

title: Data Analyst
description: Looking for a Data Analyst skilled in SQL, Excel, Power BI, Python, and dashboard creation.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Require expertise in Node.js, Express, MongoDB, REST APIs, and database schema design.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Looking for MERN stack developer with experience in React, Node.js, MongoDB, Express and deployment.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, Linux, AWS, Bash scripting preferred.

title: Cloud Engineer
description: Hands-on experience with AWS services, EC2, S3, Lambda, VPC, CloudWatch and Terraform.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Basic knowledge of OOP, Data Structures, Algorithms, Git and problem solving expected.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Knowledge of network security, vulnerability scanning, Linux, SIEM tools and Python required.

title: Android App Developer
description: Experience with Kotlin, Android Studio, Firebase, REST APIs and UI/UX understanding.

title: iOS Developer
description: Experience with Swift, Xcode, UIKit, REST APIs and app deployment on App Store.

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description: Skilled in manual testing, automation (Selenium), test cases, bug tracking tools, and SQL.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Experience with Figma, Adobe XD, wireframing, prototyping, and user research.

title: Blockchain Developer
description: Smart contract development using Solidity, Web3.js, Ethereum, and blockchain fundamentals.

title: Game Developer
description: Experience with Unity, C#, game physics, animations, and 2D/3D game mechanics.

title: Database Administrator
description: Strong knowledge of MySQL, PostgreSQL, backup & recovery, indexing, and performance tuning.

title: AI Research Intern
description: Knowledge of deep learning, PyTorch/TensorFlow, NLP, neural networks and Python required.

title: Big Data Engineer
description: Experience with Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, Python, ETL pipelines, and distributed computing.

title: Technical Support Engineer
description: Good understanding of Windows/Linux systems, troubleshooting, networking basics and communication skills.
